title: Crime Alert 10.28.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 10.28.19
description:
Woman drives through construction crew, killing one. Woman arrested for impersonating a public servant.


This week's podcast is sponsored by the new Wondery podcast Bad Batch. https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/bad-batch/id1482851200
